title: Why does autofill still exist when no one likes it
body:
I've had it up to here dealing with stupid autofill and having to play shitty ass roles like support. You introduced the role selection system so we could get the roles we wanted yet I'm still forced to play support which I utterly despise and always end up losing. I'm playing in low elo here which is full of autistic children so I have to play my carry roles so I can actually climb. Yet somehow someone dodges and suddenly I'm autofilled into support and it's pretty much an instant loss for me. It's fucking bullshit and I've had enough. What happened to the idea you had where you could select one role you never want to get? Why was that scrapped? NO ONE LIKES AUTOFILL. People have said time and time again that they would rather wait 10+ minutes to play the role they want. Why won't you listen to us? I don't want to play support, I don't want to have to dodge every time I get support. 

It's ruining the experience for me, I want to have fun and autofill isn't helping. Please listen and understand where I'm coming from, I play League because I enjoy playing top and mid, I like playing darius/jax top and talon/vel koz mid, I enjoy those roles. I never have fun when I'm playing support. Frankly I just feel like going afk, but of course I'm just gonna get banned so I play out the stupid match anyway. Video games are suppose to allow the player to enjoy themselves so why are you forcing us to play something we don't enjoy?

replies.body: Check out this article from within the month: http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/06/ask-riot-autofilled/

I don't care how "fun" they try to make support I hate the damn role, I can't win games and climb playing support because everyone in my elo is trash. I do appreciate that they're trying to do something about it though.
i mean the old system was simply luck. be thankful there is more control and less luck in role selection now.
I always autofill when I don't feel like playing support.
How does that make any sense when autofilling gives you support 50% of the time since its the least popular role

Yet again more dumb minded children downvote everything I say because they can't respect my opinion and understand what I'm trying to say, keep living in the dark and blindly following this bullshit system, you're exactly what keeps Riot from actually doing anything to make League better.

i lose the majority of my games from people being autofilled and feeding horribly because they have no clue how to play the roll. autofill is fucking retarded in low elo. just fuck it off i dont mind waiting for games i want to play and not afk within the first 15 minutes of the game because the enemy team is about 15k gold ahead because some dipshit got adc and is now 0/6 and im the support.
